components.DocManager.button-download-to: Download signed document. Be sure to save the original rather than a copy.
components.DocManager.button-multisign-t: Invite other users to sign the document. After all invitees sign, you'll be asked to add a final signature.
components.DocManager.button-sign-tootip: Select documents above and click here to send them for signing.
components.DocManager.forced-preview-but: You have to confirm that you have uploaded the correct document
components.DocManager.preview-button-too: Display a preview of the unsigned document
components.DocManager.retry-button-tooti: Try again to prepare the document for signing
components.ForcedPreview.confirm-doc-too: Once you have visited the last page of the document, you will be able to click here to confirm that this is the document you want to sign
components.Header.header-unauthz-for-sit: You don't seem to be authorized to use this site at this moment
components.InviteForm.add-invitation-too: Invite one more person to sign this document
components.InviteForm.invitation-text-fi: Add a message to send to all invitees
components.InviteForm.send-invitation-to: Send invitations to sign to indicated people
components.Invited.invited-doc-name: You have been invited to sign
components.Owned.owned-doc-name: You have invited signers to sign
components.ReInviteForm.re-invitation-te: Add a message to send to all invitees pending to sign
components.ReInviteForm.re-invite-people: Resend invitation to people pending to sign {docName}
components.ReInviteForm.resend-invitatio: Resend invitations to sign to invitees pending to sign
docmanager-help-failed-loading: This does not seem to be a valid document
docmanager-help-failed-preparing: There was a problem preparing the document for signing, clik on the button labelled "retry" to try again
docmanager-help-failed-signing: There was a problem signing the document, to try again click on the checkbox to the left and then on the button labelled "Sign Selected Documents"
docmanager-help-loaded: To sign this document, select it on the checkbox to left and then click on the button labelled "Sign Selected Documents"
docmanager-help-loading: Please wait while the document loads
docmanager-help-selected: Click on the button below labelled "Sign Selected Documents" to sign this document
docmanager-help-signed: Document succesfully signed, click on the button labelled "Download (signed)" to download it
docmanager-help-signing: Please wait while the document is signed
docmanager-help-unconfirmed: Click on the button labelled "Check document" to review the document and confirm that you want to sign it
header-confirm-clear-text: Clicking "Confirm" will remove all documents from your list
header-confirm-remove-owned-text: Clicking "Confirm" will remove all invitations to sign the document
invited-preview-button-help: Click here to preview the document
invited-sign-button-help: Click here to sign the document
load-doc-problem-signing: There was a problem signing the document
owned-preview-button-help: Click here to preview the document
owned-resend-button-help: Click here to re-send an invitation email to all pending users
owned-sign-button-help: All requested users have alredy signed the document, click here to add your final signature
owned-skip-button-help: All requested users have alredy signed the document, click here to skip adding your final signature
prepare-doc-problem: Problem preparing document, please try again
problem-clearing-db: problem clearing db, please try again
problem-creating-multisign: Problem creating multi sign request, please try again
problem-fetching-document: Problem fetching document from the backend
problem-removing-multisign: Problem removing multi sign request, please try again
problem-sending-invitations: Problem sending invitations to sign, please try again
problem-sending-multisign: Problem sending multi sign request, please try again
save-doc-problem-dup: A document with that name has already been loaded
validate-problem-password: Please do not supply a password protected document
